Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Dublin (Ballymun), Travelodge Dublin Airport South is convenient to Omni Park Shopping Centre and Dublin City University. This hotel is within close proximity of Morton Stadium and National Botanic Gardens.

Rooms
Stay in one of 125 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and digital programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have shower/tub combinations and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Travelodge Dublin Airport South, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a computer station, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge at scheduled times, and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3:00 PM Check-out time is noon
You can enjoy a meal at a restaurant serving the guests of Travelodge Dublin Airport South, or find a snack in a coffee shop/café. English breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Dublin (Ballymun), Travelodge Dublin Airport South is convenient to Omni Park Shopping Centre and Dublin City University. This hotel is within close proximity of Morton Stadium and National Botanic Gardens.
Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Morton Stadium - 2 km / 1.2 mi
Omni Park Shopping Centre - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Bon Secours Hospital - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi

Fairview Park - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Croke Park - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
James Joyce Cultural Centre - 5.9 km / 3.6 mi

Old Jameson Distillery - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Parnell Square - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi
Garden of Remembrance - 5.9 km / 3.7 mi

The preferred airport for Travelodge Dublin Airport South is Dublin (DUB) - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
